scripts.build: nativefier --internal-urls "'($(grep url: inject.js | awk -F"'" '{printf $2"|"}'))'" --inject inject.js --name "TheInternet" -p darwin -a x64 $(grep url: inject.js | awk -F"'" '{print $2}' | head -n 1) && nativefier --internal-urls "'($(grep url: inject.js | awk -F"'" '{printf $2"|"}'))'" --inject inject.js --name "TheInternet" -p win32 -a x64 $(grep url: inject.js | awk -F"'" '{print $2}' | head -n 1) && nativefier --internal-urls "'($(grep url: inject.js | awk -F"'" '{printf $2"|"}'))'" --inject inject.js --name "TheInternet" -p linux -a x64 $(grep url: inject.js | awk -F"'" '{print $2}' | head -n 1)
